column4: hi ..i use a 64bit version of ubuntu ... where can i get flash flayer?
i want to use flash player ... but the official version does not work
install the flashplugin-nonfree package, or download http://download.macromedia.com/pub/labs/flashplayer10/libflashplayer-10.0.22.87.linux-x86_64.so.tar.gz and extract it to ~/.mozilla/plugins/
